title: 072 - Big Poppa Soak
description: On today's show, the guys discuss Zeet's new chain link necklace and how Orlando has birthed the legend that is Big Poppa Soak. They also discuss what the best type of peanut butter is, give a few shoutouts to some listeners that have overcome some time situations, address the budding rivalry between Dave Traego of Year of the Buffalo and a few members of The Pod, continue their push to try and reunite Scott Stapp and the rest of Creed for a potential reunion tour, and get into a packed Pod FOD. The gang's all here, it's a fun one. Enjoy.
dc:creator: The Pod
